definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: So, I want to apologize for flipping out before.
sentences.chinese: 我想对之前发神经的事向你道歉。

sentences.english: ‘This guy’s nuts,’ I can hear you saying.
sentences.chinese: “这家伙发神经了吧，”我猜你肯定要这么说。

sentences.english: Ralph really lost his mind after his wife left him.
sentences.chinese: 洛夫在他太太离开他后真的发神经了。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the main factors of mental and nervous symptom in chronic renal failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析慢性肾衰竭并发神经精神症状的原因。

sentences.english: Last night, I got it again. Wanted to throw myself out of the window.
sentences.chinese: 昨天晚上，我又发神经了，想从窗户上跳下去。

sentences.english: Don't have a cow! it's just a small bug.
sentences.chinese: 别发神经了，这只是一个小臭虫。

definition: (slang) (pun on 神經病|神经病[shen2 jing1 bing4]) crazy person/nutjob
to be foolish/to play dumb/to gaze absentmindedly
(lit.) to have taken the wrong medicine/(fig.) (of one's behavior etc) different than usual/abnormal
in the depth of night/late at night
to have lost one's mind/crazy/soft in the head
